item.text:
OVERVIEW The OOH/CDN toolkit contains default creative as well as a series of templates for co-branded OOH printed (Vinyl) boards or CDN (digital) boards. The templates contain pre-approved Coca-Cola creative imagery as well as approved headlines. There are designated areas for the inclusion of partner logos and/or images. The partner templates also have versions to allow for Directional signage/text placement as well as Photo Examples that demonstrate best practices in terms of image type and quality for use with the templates. Each template contains versions in the following sizes: CDN:
  • Digital Bulletin
  • Digital Poster
  • Digital Shelter
    • OOH:
  • Outdoor Poster
  • Vertical Kiosk
  • Bulletin
OBJECTIVE Drive traffic to partners and increase purchase of Coca-Cola at partner locations / OOH & CDN Regional Template Process and Guidelines

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website Sharon Brimer // 404-355-7902 / Contact via Email DETAILS No customization allowed on default creative. CDN specs: • Digital Bulletin 700 pixels x 400 pixels • Digital Poster 648 pixels x 648 pixels • Digital Shelter 1080 pixels x 954 pixels Vinyl specs: • Outdoor Poster 23"x5" @300dpi • Vertical Kiosk 12.5"x8" @300dpi • Bulletin 12.5"x6" @300dpi

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website Sharon Brimer // 404-355-7902 / Contact via Email DETAILS No customization allowed on default creative. CDN specs: • Digital Bulletin 700 pixels x 400 pixels • Digital Poster 648 pixels x 648 pixels • Digital Shelter 1080 pixels x 954 pixels Vinyl specs: • Outdoor Poster 23"x5" @300dpi • Vertical Kiosk 12.5"x8" @300dpi • Bulletin 12.5"x6" @300dpi

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website Sharon Brimer // 404-355-7902 / Contact via Email DETAILS No customization allowed on default creative. ORDERING For customization and to order artwork, contact: Finished Art / Website Sharon Brimer // 404-355-7902 / Contact via Email DETAILS CDN Images need to be: • Digital Bulletin 700 pixels x 400 pixels • Digital Poster 648 pixels x 648 pixels • Digital Shelter 1080 pixels x 954 pixels Vinyl Images need to be: • Outdoor Poster 23"x5" @300dpi • Vertical Kiosk 12.5"x8" @300dpi • Bulletin 12.5"x6" @300dpi All logos must be vector art files (PDF, Adobe Illustrator)

ORDERING Template access via Design Machine: / Website / User Guide Sizes currently available:
  • 14 x 48
  • 30-sheet
  • Vertical Kiosk
    •  Note: Templates are only able to be customized with a partner logo.

CUSTOMIZATION To customize with a customer logo or if a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email
